message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $200. I think you'll find it's a real steal at this price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $60 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $180. I believe this product offers significant value, and this is a very fair price.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
